name: Introduction to Chemistry
description: This course covers the basics of Chemistry, such as atomic structure, chemical bonding, and stoichiometry.

name: Organic Chemistry I
description: This course covers the basics of Organic Chemistry, such as naming conventions, nomenclature, and its history.

name: Organic Chemistry II
description: This course covers the more advanced topics of Organic Chemistry, such as stereochemistry, chemical reactions, and synthesis.

name: Advanced Organic Chemistry I
description: This course covers the even more advanced topics of Organic Chemistry, such as advanced synthesis, spectroscopy, and reaction mechanisms.

name: Advanced Organic Chemistry II
description: This course covers the most advanced topics of Organic Chemistry, such as advanced synthesis, spectroscopy, and reaction mechanisms.
